audience: Investors and potential partners in technology and productivity solutions

sections.intent: Hook the audience and establish context
keyPoints: Muse empowers users to capture and utilize their thoughts effectively.
The presentation outlines the transformative potential of Muse.
Highlight the unique approach of Muse in knowledge management.
72% of people experience ephemeral ideas that go unrecorded.
Less than 2% of thoughts are captured, leading to lost insights.
Employees waste significant time searching for previously seen information.

sections.intent: Present Muse as the innovative solution to the problem
keyPoints: Muse acts as a 'Thought Garden' that understands and connects notes.
Transforms passive note-taking into proactive knowledge creation.
Utilizes proprietary LLMs to build a personalized knowledge graph.
Smart Surfacing for augmented retrieval beyond keyword search.
Proactively generates deliverables from user inputs.
Contextual understanding enhances the relevance of retrieved notes.
Freemium SaaS model with a free tier and a pro tier.
Pro tier includes advanced AI generation and integrations.
Ad revenue from the free tier without disrupting user experience.

sections.intent: Highlight Muse's unique advantages over competitors
keyPoints: First mover in the knowledge empowerment space.
No onboarding friction, enhancing user retention.
World's first proactive AI designed for knowledge management.

sections.intent: Detail funding requirements and future vision
keyPoints: $1.5M pre-seed funding to expand engineering resources.
Launch MVP with multi-platform support.
Long-term vision to become the operating system for human cognition.
